title: S12 Ep59: A Haunted Life
itunes:title: A Haunted Life
description:
We walk with Christopher Maggard on his historical journey into the unknown from his early years when he witnessed the most horrific supernatural attacks on his family in Southern California, to Northern Kentucky to his continuing investigations into famous haunted locations.

Christopher Maggard: http://www.paranormalreality.tv/

http://www.tspnorthernkentucky.com/
